#summary Object Description Language (ODL)
#labels Documentation

= Introduction =

The Object Description Language (ODL) is a data model for driving sourcecode generation.  

The GAP ODL process employs a [http://code.google.com/p/hapax2 Hapax2] template for transforming the ODL model into Java Programming Language (JPL) sourcecode. 

One example ODL file is for the online Hapax [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse/trunk/odl/gap/data/Template.odl Template].
